FuncDef: The display debugging psnpg command displays information about all PIM snooping debugging functions.
Examples: PIM snooping assert debugging switch is on
PIM snooping event debugging switch is on
PIM snooping join-prune debugging switch is on
PIM snooping neighbor debugging switch is on
PIM snooping packet debugging switch is on
ExtraInfo: To check whether debugging is enabled for PIM snooping, run the display debugging psnpg command.
